column4: i've been reading the man for apt but i can't find anything on installing packages i d/l from proiders like skype. i'm a rank noobie. can anyone please point me to a place where i can learn to install packages that aren't in the distros oor in the universe depository?
you use the 'dpkg' command to install local .deb files.  That said, the skype package on their website doesn't work in ubuntu, see the /msg ubotu has sent you
